law.history: Repealed 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 388, sec. 35, effective July 14, 2000; amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 388, sec. 33, effective July 14, 2001. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 388, sec. 33, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 60, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 7, sec. 34, effective June 18, 1970.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/14/2000). Under KRS 446.260, the repeal of this section in 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 388, sec. 35 prevails over its amendment in 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 388, sec. 33.
